snippet: Representative Dennis Cardoza of California had already announced that he would not run for re-election and retire after this year. But on Tuesday, he issued a statement surprising many saying that he would, in fact, step down immediately.
abstract: Representative Dennis Cardoza of California had already announced that he would not run for re-election and retire after this year. But on Tuesday, he issued a statement surprising many saying that he would, in fact, step down immediately.

headline.main: Lawmaker Literally Can't Wait to Leave Congress
headline.print_headline: An Early Retirement: Forgoing the Next Five Months
